title: Trimming, early 19th century
medium: White, black,  and colored silk in uncut, voided velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: A crowned shield showing two goats in black on yellow ground surrounded by compartments containing, alternately, a castle and a cross; crowned oval showing bands of checkerboard within a border with crosses, in red and yellow.

tombstone.epitaph: Trimming, early 19th century.White, black,  and colored silk in uncut, voided velvet weave.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-49.
